parsing_result:
# The Command and Function Dials

The roles of the command and function dials vary with the mode.

| Mode          | Front Command Dial       | Rear Command Dial        | Fn (Function) Dial   |
|---------------|--------------------------|--------------------------|----------------------|
| AUTO (AUTO)   | Auto/Scene Position      |                          |                      |
| P (PROGRAM AE)| Program shift            | Exposure compensation    |                      |
| S (SHUTTER PRIORITY AE) | Shutter speed  | Exposure compensation    | Film simulation      |
| A (APERTURE PRIORITY AE)| Aperture       |                          |                      |
| M (MANUAL)    | Shutter speed            |                          |                      |
| FILTER (FILTER)| Program shift           | Exposure compensation    | Filter selection     |
| Vlog          |                          |                          |                      |
| C1/C2/C3/C4 (CUSTOM) | Varies with exposure mode |                  |                      |
| ðŸŽ¥ (MOVIE)    |                          |                          |                      |

> The role performed by the function dial can be chosen using  
> **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > FUNCTION (Fn) SETTING** (page 320).
